Publish.LongDescription:
# Universal Zoning System (UZS)
Create diverse, multi-cultural cities by mixing architectural styles from all regions in unified zone types!
**Now in ALPHA TESTING - Volunteers needed!**
## Features
- **10 Universal Zone Types** - Low/Medium/High Residential, Row Houses, Low Rent, Mixed Use, Low/High Commercial, Low/High Office - **Multi-Region Building Mix** - Buildings from NA, EU, UK, Germany, France, Netherlands, Eastern Europe, Japan, China spawn together - **Vanilla Spawning Logic** - Buildings still respect demand, land value, and desirability - **Original Zones Preserved** - EU/NA zones continue to work normally - **Region Toggles** - Enable/disable specific regions in mod settings - **PDX Mods Compatible** - No Harmony patches required
## How It Works
Universal zones combine buildings from ALL installed regional content packs. When you paint a universal zone, the game's spawn system can select from buildings across all enabled regions, creating diverse streetscapes.
## Alpha Test Disclaimer
This is an experimental release. Expect issues, bugs, and potential game crashes. Always backup your saves. Use at your own risk.
## Reporting Issues
Please report bugs with these logs: - `C:\Users\[user]\AppData\LocalLow\Colossal Order\Cities Skylines II\Logs\UniversalZoningSystem.log` - `C:\Users\[user]\AppData\LocalLow\Colossal Order\Cities Skylines II\Logs\Player.log`
## Credits
Built using the Cities: Skylines II modding framework. Thanks to the CS2 modding community!
